reviewText: i bought it for my son and it's great try buying one. i like it a lot. My Son enjoy watching it.
Great video and runs for a long time.  She loves Spartacus and gives good examples of eating habits to stay strong

My kids used to watch this show, we love that it promotes activity AND learning moral lessons. The kids were really into the songs and fun. I purchased this DVD for my 1 year old nephew, he might be a little young for it yet but, I think he'll get a few years of enjoyment out of it.
bought them for my nephew and he loves them. He even let us know that they are his movies and no one elses

my 10yr old used to watch this show when she was younger and I found it on tv again recently. I introduced my 3 and 1 yr old to it and they love it just as much as she used to (and secretly she still likes watching it) :)
This was a Christmas gift for my daughter.  She loves this DVD and watches it a lot.  This was a great buy.
nice long video to entertain my boys escpecially my 3 yr old. it gets him up and moving during exercise moves like Sportacus.

Sportacus is an exciting type of role model.
He's fit and promotes fruits & vegetables! How could
you go wrong???
happy with dvd. quick delivery from seller
grand daughter enjoys it very much
Son will watch over and over again, he absolutely loves it. He runs around the house doing cartwheels, tumble salt, etc.
I have never seen a lazy town episode that I didn't like. This DVD has almost 2 hours of shows and all of them are good.
my child loves sports and lazy town so this was perfect maybe just not as long as he would have liked
My kids just love Lazy Town and this movie seems to be my kids favorite they can watch it even the whole day if I let them do it, this show keeps them very active and motivated for exercise.
My kids love Lazy Town and I love that the show talks about good eating and exercise.  I'm bummed that the show is no longer airing, and it's difficult to find DVD's of past episodes.
This show is a positive show that keeps kids active, my daughter is 2 1/2 and she loves everything about  Lazy Town!
